data.name: Life of a caveman
data.detailed_description:
You are a caveman. Your business is not being hungry. You do that by hunting animals. Or eating fruits if you want to be a vegetarian caveman. Sometimes you dance and socialise with the other tribe members. You enjoy that. Your only worry is getting back to the resting place in time, before dark.

Solve the mysteries in your dreams

You are a smart caveman. As smart as cavemen can be. You sometimes have strange dreams. It's like these dreams want you to do certain things. Whenever figure out what it is and you succeed, you wake up even smarter. You are able to invent new skills and weapons the next day.

Kill the night beast

A tribe member didn't make it up in time back to the resting place one night this week. The next day you found signs of a struggle. The night beast must have killed him. You want revenge. You want to kill it once and for all. This beast is a cowardly one. It only attacks in the dark. If only there was a way to bring light into the night.

Become alpha

You know you are a born leader. You love your tribe and want to help it thrive. Together you can bring down the greatest of beasts and secure the best feeding grounds. If only you could defeat the current leader and take his place.

Defeat the others

Recently strange marks have appeared on the ground. Footprints like your own. You are starting to suspect another tribe is near by. Your instinct tells you they are not friendly. You want to try to become stronger to fend them off if they attack.

Do caveman stuff

After all you are a caveman.You enjoy it, even if it'a not easy being a caveman.

data.short_description: Live the colorful life of a caveman. Eat and interact with other cavemen in order to grow stronger and smarter. Once you are strong enough, become the leader of your group and guide them to safety; safety from things like the the beast that attacks at night and the other tribe that left tracks in your area.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: INTEL Core 2 Duo 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB & AMD 5570 or nVidia 45
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x64 / Windows 8.1x64 / Windows 10x64
  • Processor: Fourth Generation Intel Core i5 2.5 Ghz or AMD FX8350 4.0 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB & AMD 7970 or nVidia 770 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device
